Identification_Area.title: DEEP IMPACT INSTRUMENT MOVIES OF 9P/TEMPEL 1, V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Farnham, T.L., D.D. Wellnitz, D.L. Hampton, J.-Y. Li, J.M. Sunshine, O. Groussin, L.A. McFadden, C.J. Crockett, M.F. A'Hearn, M.J.S. Belton, P. Schultz, and C.M. Lisse, Dust coma morphology in the Deep Impact images of Comet 9P/Tempel 1, Icarus, 187, 26-40, 2007, doi:10.1016/j.icarus.2006.10.036.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: DEEP IMPACT INSTRUMENT MOVIES OF 9P/TEMPEL 1, V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: A'hearn, M.F., C. Crockett and T.L. Farnham, DEEP IMPACT INSTRUMENT MOVIES OF 9P/TEMPEL 1, V1.0, DIF-C-HRIV/ITS/MRI-5-MOVIE-COLL-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2006.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Movies created by combining images from the HRI/Vis, ITS and MRI instruments flown on the Deep Impact flybay and impactor crafts.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set comprises a collection of movies of comet 9P/Tempel 1, created from observations made by the High Resolution (visual mode) and Medium Resolution Instruments aboard the flyby craft, and the Impactor Tracking Sensor aboard the impactor craft.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc: Data Set Overview ================= This data set comprises a collection of movies of comet 9P/Tempel 1, created from observations made by the High Resolution (visual mode) and Medium Resolution Instruments aboard the flyby craft, and the Impactor Tracking Sensor aboard the impactor craft. The movies were referenced by Farnham, et al. (2007) and [TBD]
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= Note that movies are not currently accepted for archiving by the Planetary Data System. Format may change as requests come in. For assistance with these files, please contact the Small Bodies Node.
Review ====== This data set is not currently schduled for review.
